description: Test suite for authentication middleware and validation logic in a Node.js backend, including JWT token verification and express-validator validation rules.

methods.name: authenticateToken
methods.description: Middleware function that verifies JWT token from the Authorization header, adds user info to request object, and handles token errors.

methods.name: registerValidation
methods.description: Validation chain for user registration including email, password, and name validation.

methods.name: loginValidation
methods.description: Validation chain for user login including email and password validation.
